snippet: The Wall Street bank is acquiring $16 billion in customer deposits from GE Capital Bank, which General Electric is shedding to focus on its industrial business.
abstract: Goldman Sachs announces that it is acquiring $16 billion in customer deposits from GE Capital Bank; deal gives Golman starting point to expand its new role as savings bank for retail customers.
lead_paragraph: The Wall Street bank is acquiring $16 billion in customer deposits from GE Capital Bank, which General Electric is shedding to focus on its industrial business.

headline.main: Goldman Expands Retail Banking by Taking On GE Capital’s Deposits
headline.print_headline: With Purchase, Goldman Expands Retail Banking
